name: Robert BELL, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Bell v. Commonwealth, Department of Corrections

parties: Robert BELL, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of April, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

Robert BELL, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
